en.title: Congratulations! FusionExcel Team Wins Chess Championship.
en.content:
Congratulations to the FusionExcel Team, comprising 4 of Malaysia's top chess players (FM Nicholas Chan, FM Mok Tze Meng, FM Lim Yee Weng and FM Ooi Chern Ee) for winning the Tun Syed Zahiruddin Cup (Open Chess Team Tournament) 2007/2008 ! This prestigious tournament was held on 16 March 2008 at the Dewan Sri Tanjung , Kolej Kediaman Tun Syed Zahiruddin (KK9), Universiti Malaya. 

Once again, FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant provides the winning edge!.

meta.description: Congratulations to the FusionExcel Team, comprising 4 of Malaysia's top chess players...
meta.keyword: FusionExcel Team wins Chess Championship, Tun Syed Zahiruddin Cup...
meta.author: klhunter

bm.title: FE Donates RM 5,000.00 to Malaysian Mental Health Association.

meta.description: FusionExcel is proud to donate RM 5,000.00 to support the Malaysian Mental Health Association's (MMHA) Big Walk 2008.
meta.keyword: Malaysian Mental Health Association's (MMHA), Big Walk 2008, Paul Ting, Datin Dr. Ang Kim Teng, Yuan Yu Fang, Ms Law, Dataran Padang Petaling Jaya, 19th October 2008
meta.author: klhunter
